'''Right at Home''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook.

The recipe for Right at Home can be obtained from the {{Quest|Receiver of Friends From Afar: Part IV}}.

Depending on the quality, Right at Home increases the party's defense by '''165'''/'''200'''/'''235''' for 300 seconds.  Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].
